title: I want to change my LOL language
body:
I want to change my LOL language feom English to Korean
How can I change it?

replies.body: On the login screen, there's an option to [**change the language**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594) just below the password box. Korean, however, isn't one of the supported languages for NA.
There should be a tab where u log in, in ur client. And there u can change language.
